text: we all know what it's like when a
conversation dies and we start fidgeting
out of awkward silence or awkward
boredom well you don't need perfect
people skills to have a great
conversation what you need is just a few
prepared phrases and some practice well
I'd say that you should ask questions
and no you shouldn't ask yes or no
question but those that require detailed
answers or you can get to know the other
person's interests and have a few common
Universal topics to talk about and this
is how you can have a graceful exit from
a great conversation if you feel you
want to know more about this about how
to keep a conversation going or how to
tackle awkward silences
then just click on the link that will
appear at the screen at the end of the
video and watch the complete session
with me on skillopedia the place to
learn real communication
[Music]
[Applause]
